title: aria-required attribute on each HTML radio button in a fieldset
description:
This test checks the aria-required attribute as applied to each HTML radio button in a fieldset. Notes: 

* Currently, the most robust solution to mark a group of radio buttons as required is to place the text 'required' in the group label.

output.output: "cat radio button, not checked, required, 1 of 3"
"Animal, cat radio button, not checked, required, 1 of 3"
"CatDog radio button, not checked, required, 1 of 3"
"Animal, CatDog radio button, not checked, required, 3 of 3"

chrome.notes: The required state is conveyed for each radio in the group. Some users might find this confusing since only one radio can be selected at a time.

output.output: "cat radio button, not checked, required, 1 of 3"
"Animal, cat radio button, not checked, required, 1 of 3"
"CatDog radio button, not checked, required, 1 of 3"
"Animal, CatDog radio button, not checked, required, 3 of 3"
